data.title: N2OFF merges with MitoCareX to target tough-to-treat cancers like pancreatic and lung, focusing on mitochondrial SLC25 protein family.
data.description: In Neve Yarak, Israel on October 30, 2025, N2OFF, Inc. (NASDAQ: NITO) announced the completion of their merger with MitoCareX Bio Ltd., a biotech company concentrating on drug discovery for cancer treatments and other ailments by targeting the mitochondrial SLC25 protein family. N2OFF, a cleantech firm investing in solar energy assets via the RTB business model, finalized the merger, marking a significant step in expanding their portfolio and entering the biotech sphere. This collaboration opens new opportunities for both companies to innovate in the healthcare sector, leveraging their expertise in solar energy and drug development.

data.title: Raptor Comply streamlines compliance for power generators, saving $110k+ by automating NERC tasks.
data.description: In Boston, a new software called Raptor Comply has been launched to streamline compliance processes for both IT and OT teams. This software automates NERC-related tasks, allowing power generators to save over $110,000 by focusing on running their plants instead of dealing with paperwork and administrative burdens.

data.title: American States Water Co. (NYSE:AWR) announces $0.5040 per share quarterly dividend, marking its 358th consecutive payment.
data.description: In San Dimas, California, on October 28, 2025, the Board of Directors of American States Water Company (NYSE: AWR) has announced the approval of a quarterly dividend of $0.5040 per share on the Common Shares. This marks the 358th consecutive dividend payment by the company. Demonstrating a strong commitment to shareholders, American States Water Company has a remarkable track record of paying dividends since 1931. Shareholders have enjoyed increasing dividends each calendar year for 71 consecutive years, highlighting the company's dedication to providing consistent returns.

data.title: International lawyer Robert Amsterdam warns U.S. investors about Spain's tax abuses, demands suspension of U.S.-Spain cooperation.
data.description: Amsterdam & Partners LLP, an international law firm, is set to make a public statement denouncing the Spanish tax system. They will demand the suspension of cooperation between the United States and Spain until the rule of law is reinstated. The firm will be presenting the U.S. edition of its white paper titled "Hacienda" during a news conference in New York on October 30, 2025. This paper is expected to raise key concerns about the tax system in Spain.

data.title: $4.1 million NIH grant to improve asthma care for local school children in Bronx through modernizing medication process.
data.description: Bronx, New York - Researchers at Montefiore Einstein have secured a recent National Institutes of Health (NIH) grant on October 30, 2025, to streamline the asthma medication process for children. The grant aims to improve access to medications for kids at school. This initiative seeks to foster better cooperation between primary care providers to modernize the asthma treatment system. This study can potentially benefit a significant number of children dealing with asthma by making medication more easily accessible during school hours.

data.title: Cryptocurrency market remains resilient despite recent volatility, poised for substantial growth in the coming years.
data.description: In a recent report, industry analysts and research firms are predicting significant growth in the cryptocurrency market and its submarkets in the upcoming years. The data suggests that the digital currency industry is poised for substantial expansion. This trend is expected to drive robust growth across various sectors within the cryptocurrency market. The report highlights a positive outlook for the industry, with experts foreseeing potential for substantial increases in market value and adoption rates. This projection underscores the burgeoning opportunities in the cryptocurrency sector, with forecasts pointing towards continued expansion and development. Investors and stakeholders can anticipate a flourishing market, with notable growth potential in the coming years.

data.title: Pēq appoints Ben Flaccus as Chief Growth Officer to drive adoption of its OmniCommerce Performance Platform, aiming to expand and boost growth.
data.description: On October 30, 2025, Pēq, a prominent company specializing in independent incrementality measurement and optimization within the commerce media ecosystem, revealed the selection of Ben Flaccus as their new Chief Growth Officer. Flaccus will be responsible for spearheading the company's growth initiatives and driving increased adoption of their services.

data.title: SPG partners with Vertafore for Surefyre™ tool to enhance underwriting efficiency, speed-to-market.
data.description: Specialty Program Group LLC (SPG) has chosen Surefyre™, an AI-powered underwriting workbench and agent portal provided by Vertafore®. This technology is aimed at boosting SPG's efficiency in the insurance industry, leading to faster speed-to-market. The announcement was made on October 30, 2025, in Denver. SPG's decision to implement Surefyre™ indicates a drive towards innovation and optimization in their operations, likely resulting in improved productivity and streamlined processes. This move signifies a strategic investment in cutting-edge insurance technology, showcasing SPG's commitment to staying ahead in the competitive insurance market.

data.title: 1kx's report predicts $20B generated in onchain fees in 2025, driving DeFi's dominance and 126% application growth.
data.description: DeFi emerges as the dominant force in the 2025 blockchain landscape, propelling Onchain Revenue to a remarkable $20 billion economic powerhouse. The reduction in transaction fees has led to a substantial 126% year-over-year application growth, indicating a surge in blockchain adoption. 1kx, an early stage VC specializing in revolutionary blockchain investments, is closely monitoring this evolving ecosystem.

The Armed Forces of the Russian Federation are ready to cease hostilities for 5-6 hours and provide corridors for foreign media with guarantees of safety for them and Russian military personnel, the Ministry of Defense reported.

data.title: Verndale strengthens data & AI team to boost analytics expertise and drive growth for clients. Doubling down on analytics leadership.
data.description: Verndale has recently made significant new leadership hires in Boston on Oct. 30, 2025, aiming to strengthen its expertise in data and analytics. The company is focused on aiding clients in leveraging AI technology and promoting growth. With businesses increasingly prioritizing the preparation of their data infrastructure for AI integration, Verndale is intensifying its analytics capabilities to support clients in this endeavor. This move underscores Verndale's commitment to enhancing its services and providing innovative solutions to meet the evolving needs of organizations.

data.title: XPO beats Q3 earnings with $2.11 billion revenue, $128 million net income, and $1.07 EPS, exceeding expectations. CEO lauds NA segment performance.
data.description: XPO, Inc. (NYSE: XPO) saw an increase in premarket trading after reporting its financial results for the third quarter of 2025. The company's revenue for the quarter reached $2.11 billion, surpassing the estimated $2.07 billion. On an adjusted basis, the net income for the quarter was $128 million, a rise from $122 million in the third quarter of 2024. The adjusted earnings per share (EPS) of $1.07 exceeded the analyst consensus of $1.02. XPO's operating income decreased to $164 million from $176 million in the same period last year. For full details, visit the Benzinga.com website.

data.title: Q/C Technologies unveils qc-LPU100™ brand for quantum-class laser processing units, using natural light for quantum computer speeds.
data.description: Cutting-edge LPUs have been developed to operate at speeds comparable to quantum computers, utilizing natural light instead of electric signals. This innovation allows for computation at exceptional speeds, bringing a significant advancement in the field of quantum computing.
EUROPEAN CENTRAL BANK WILL MAKE INTEREST RATE DECISIONS BASED ON ECONOMIC DATA AND RISK ASSESSMENTS, FOLLOWING A DATA-DEPENDENT AND MEETING-TO-MEETING APPROACH, CONSIDERING INFLATION AND ITS DRIVERS
ECB: ECB is not pre-committing to a particular rate path.

ECB SAYS APP AND PANDEMIC EMERGENCY PURCHASE PROGRAMME (PEPP) APP AND PEPP PORTFOLIOS ARE DECLINING AT A MEASURED AND PREDICTABLE PACE, AS EUROSYSTEM NO LONGER REINVESTS PRINCIPAL PAYMENTS FROM MATURING SECURITIES

ECB ANNOUNCED THAT INTEREST RATES WILL REMAIN THE SAME AND CLAIMS THAT INFLATION IS NEAR 2%, THEIR MEDIUM-TERM GOAL, WITH NO SIGNIFICANT CHANGE IN THE INFLATION FORECAST. THEY ALSO STATED THAT THE ECONOMY HAS KEPT GROWING DESPITE TOUGH GLOBAL CONDITIONS

data.title: Dow down after Trump-Xi talks, Meta plunges on earnings in live coverage - Investor's Business Daily.
data.description: Today, the stock market experienced a decline following the discussions between President Trump and President Xi. The Dow Jones index fell, while Meta's stock saw a significant drop due to its earnings report. Live coverage of this event can be found on Investor's Business Daily.
ECB Rate Statement - Read Here

data.title: Balchem Corp. to speak at Baird's 55th Annual Global Industrial Conference on Nov 12, 2025.
data.description: Balchem Corporation will be participating in Baird’s 55th Annual Global Industrial Conference on November 12, 2025. The conference serves as a platform for companies to showcase their industrial expertise and strategies. Balchem Corporation, a leading player in the industry, will utilize this opportunity to present their insights and vision to a diverse audience. This event is set to attract over 2,000 participants, including investors, analysts, and industry experts. Balchem Corporation's presentation is scheduled to provide valuable information on their operations, innovations, and market positioning. This participation highlights the company's commitment to engaging with key stakeholders and sharing their corporate story on a global stage.
